title: New: Mount Eerie – Distorted Cymbal
content:
For an artist as prolific and ambitious with his output as Mount Eerie, it’s perhaps a surprise that’s it been over two years since his last release, Wind’s Poem. Well thankfully Phil Elverum is back with this improvised-like little gem.

The track, “Distorted Cymbals,” will come out through K Records as a 7″ on February 7th.

Hear it at K Records’ Tumblr.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
